message.entry: Error assigning to property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. A property using the WeakHandle attribute must be a handle array. The property is being assigned an object of class ''{2}'', which is not a handle class.
Error defining property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. A property using the WeakHandle attribute must restrict its type using a class validation.

Error setting default value for property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. The default value of a property using the WeakHandle attribute must be empty or an array of invalid handles. Consider using matlab.lang.invalidHandle.

Error setting default value for property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. The default value of a property using the WeakHandle attribute must be empty or an array of invalid handles. The class ''{2}'' is using an overridden method 'empty' that is defined by class ''{3}''. This method may be creating a non-empty object array. Consider using matlab.lang.invalidHandle to create an invalid handle array of ''{2}'' objects.
Error defining property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. The class is using a custom metaproperty ''{2}''. The WeakHandle attribute is not compatible with this metaproperty.
Error defining property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. Classes with custom indexing cannot have a property with the WeakHandle attribute. Use matlab.lang.WeakReference instead of WeakHandle.
Error assigning to property ''{0}'' in class ''{1}''. A property with the WeakHandle attribute cannot be assigned an object of class ''{2}'', because ''{2}'' uses custom indexing.

Error assigning to property ''{0}'' in class ''{1}''. The property is being assigned an object of class ''{2}'', but objects of class ''{2}'' cannot be assigned to properties with the WeakHandle attribute.
Error defining property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. The superclass ''{2}'' defines ''{0}'' as using the WeakHandle attribute. Any re-definitions of the property must also use the WeakHandle attribute.
Cannot update object because the property ''{0}'' was updated to have the WeakHandle attribute.
Dynamic properties cannot use the WeakHandle attribute. Use matlab.lang.WeakReference instead.
Error defining property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. A Built-In-defined weak handle property must have an associated release function.
Error assigning to property ''{0}'' of class ''{1}''. The property is being assigned an object of class ''{2}'', but class ''{2}'' cannot be found.
Error setting default value for WeakHandle property ''{0}''. The data type ''{1}'' does not support conversion to a MATLAB array.
